posts.post_content:
Here are a couple of beautiful looking T206's that have been graded by SGC and have been determined to be trimmed slightly.  These still present very nicely, and imo look much better than many of the numerically graded counterparts.

Vic Willis throwing pose piedmont 350-460 subj.  fact. 25 $34 dlvd

SOLD - Patsy Dougherty portrait piedmont 150 subj. fact. 25 $22 dlvd


Prefer paypal gift/payment owed.  please send emails to [url]rdamboise4@gmail.com[/url], I will respond asap.  Thanks!:p
